website_summaries.verdict: Excellent power for such a lightweight and affordable powder actuated tool.
pros: Very powerful tool that outputs impressive force
Easy to use once you're comfortable with the kickback
cons: A loud tool that requires quite a bit of force to use, making it difficult for some to operate

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliable
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working really well for me. I bought mine refurbished for $25 so I feel like it is a good value. I love that I don't have to hit it with a hammer to fire it. I am using it to drive 2.5" nails through pressure treated 2x4s into my concrete basement floor. So far I have completed three walls with zero issues. Every nail is driven securely through the 2x4 and into the concrete. I use the yellow shells to drive the nails.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetDad

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this product after one project. Nailed 30+ 2"x4" studs to a cement block wall with no issues. I used ITW .22 caliber Yellow loads & ITW .300 2-1/2" Drive Pin(nails). Not 1 misfire. For the $ this is a good buy & easy to use. Wear Ear, eye protection & gloves. I didn’t wear gloves & in tight corners or close to obstacles, the force of tool can slam knuckles pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Real Deal

customer_reviews.title: Works well-Wear PPE
customer_reviews.text: Good tool for occasional user. Trigger activation is nice. Impact of 1” nails and yellow charges did a great job with some stress on the wrists. Only two blanks out of 100- probably bad loading on my part. A must to wear ear protection and a face shield!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Murtaugh

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: I have more nails in concrete then actually needed. Much more fun than drilling and using tapcons that's for sure. Wear some type of hearing protection..
customer_reviews.author: rbw

customer_reviews.title: I love this driver
customer_reviews.text: I had the manual hit with a hammer model before this one. I love this driver, works great. It came packaged well and in the promised time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Stay away terrible item!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Broke after 3 uses! Never again, I went and got a dewalt paid $15 more and no problems. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: JJG77

customer_reviews.title: Nailed it
customer_reviews.text: Nailed 2x4 no issues to extend my fence line. Centerblock and 2x4 work no problem
customer_reviews.author: JOE ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This actually broke when I was using it but it worked great for shooting nails through 2x4 into plaster and brick. I return this one and got the same one in Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I used this to anchor the sill plate on a garage when I rebuilt the walls. It did the job for a reasonable price. It does suprisingly have a little kick to it. Just use a glove for padding
customer_reviews.author: PKC

customer_reviews.title: This tool top of line
customer_reviews.text: This tool it very good i milt by the gun in the maybe soon
customer_reviews.author: Aazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was cheaper than renting and worked perfect. Every shot drove the nail through the board ...
customer_reviews.text: Doing a remodel project. This was cheaper than renting and worked perfect. Every shot drove the nail through the board (1X2) and into the solid concrete behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Ty C. Kempton

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, horrible execution
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It worked a few times then the shells got stuck until one would not come out rendering it useless. This is a good concept but is a terrible product. Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Last time i rented one but for the price this was a way better way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy to add this tool to my collection
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, arrived quickly. Happy to add this tool to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: William McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: So I needed one of these for a home remodel project but didn't want to pay top dollar since I don't have plans for much further use. I saw this model used for a much cheaper price. Condition was listed as very good with original package and manual. All this was true. Aside from a few minor dirt/grease smudges on the orange handle, it was like new. It's been working good and I'm glad I took a chance on it. Makes my project so much easier. I got a trigger style for the price of a hammer style. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy to use. I bought this to replace my old hit with the hammer one, that was anything but easy to use in tight spaces. So far I have anchored five major walls in my basement with this and it has worked great. Amazon has much better pricing than the BORG's and it is the same quality as theirs. It shoots up to 3 1/2" nails which should cover almost anything someone would want to anchor using this method.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: what no hammer drill awsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool!!!! A little awkward if you are using above your head but still well worth the price to not use tapcons
customer_reviews.author: jeff root 2

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool, easy to use...!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool for some home improvements, at the begging I trigger the tool with some fear because I was on a ladder without knowing how hard the impact will be and I didn't want to fall, finally I trigger the tool and whala I found that the tool is very easy to use just use gloves, protection glasses and cover your ears...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Davilachong

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made build my shed so much easier! Had no problem driving nails into cement. I recommend this to the DYIer
customer_reviews.author: John LaPoint

customer_reviews.title: The yellow and green loads work just fine. anybody have any suggestions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the power level 5 powder loads but all they do is blow the back out. The yellow and green loads work just fine. anybody have any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Bill L. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great have used on several projects works great every time
customer_reviews.author: James bulloch

customer_reviews.title: Plywood Subfloor on Concrete Floor
customer_reviews.text: I used this to install 3/4 plywood subfloor on my existing concrete floor. It worked great, never had a misfire with about 200 uses. It was intimidating until the 2nd shot and the rest were easy. Recommend eye and ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: icebox

customer_reviews.title: complete crap, i have called ITW about this problem
customer_reviews.text: complete crap, i have called ITW about this problem. They shoved my conversation like it never happens. I could have really been hurt. DO NOT BUT THIS TOOL. This happened after six uses. Very disappointed.....!
customer_reviews.author: Jared W.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought several varieties of competing powder actuated nail guns from a big box store none of them worked. This nailer worked fine every shot. Don't waste your money on any other brand get the best get Ramset.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item! Perfect price! It is making basement addition/finishing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kelner
